role_dependencies: Installs NodeJS on nearly any OS
role_description: An Ansible role that installs n on Mac OS X and Linux and installs nvm on Windows
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs n on Mac OS X and Linux and installs nvm on Windows nvm is a version manager for node.js, designed to be installed per-user, and invoked per-shell. nvm works on any POSIX-compliant shell (sh, dash, ksh, zsh, bash), in particular on these platforms: unix, macOS, and windows WSL.
